entries: One or more of your parents (either biological or adoptive) were heroes of the Age of Ashes Adventure Path. Others tend to treat you with a bit more respect, or perhaps fear your connections to people of great power.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be in Dexterity or Charisma, and the other is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Intimidation} skill and the {@skill Lore||Genealogy Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Group Coercion} skill feat.
